Posts.Content: Hi all, Diagnosed Brca 2 three weeks ago. Still no letter or any plan. I’m 24, mum had BC twice, Aunty, granny (who died at 44 from bc, and dad with Brca 2 gene. Saw a consultant who told me I could have MRI scan, now I have been told I will not have any intervention or treatment until I’m 30. I’m very upset and anxious about this. No idea what to do, I wanted PBM to reduce my risk.  I’ve been told ‘I’m too young’ I don’t know what to do, feeling lost alone and unsure of any options being told I’m too young is discrimination and I feel I need to stand up for what’s right for my health
